CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c , "Volleyball"), "VB", IF(ISPICKVAL( KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c , "Track & Field"), "Track", IF(ISPICKVAL( KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c , "Music"), "MUS", IF(ISPICKVAL( KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c , "Cross Country"), "CC", IF(ISPICKVAL( KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c , "Chorus"), "Chorus", IF(ISPICKVAL( KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c , "Field Hockey"), "FH", IF(ISPICKVAL( KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c , "Football"), "FB", IF(ISPICKVAL( KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c , "Wrestling"), "WR", IF(ISPICKVAL( KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c , "Girls Basketball"), "GBB", IF(ISPICKVAL( KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c , "Boys Basketball"), "BBB", IF(ISPICKVAL( KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c , "Softball"), "SB", IF(ISPICKVAL( KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c , "Baseball"), "BA", IF(ISPICKVAL( KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c , "Boys Lacrosse"), "BLAX", IF(ISPICKVAL( KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c , "Girls Lacrosse"), "GLAX", IF(ISPICKVAL( KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c , "Boys Tennis"), "BTEN", IF(ISPICKVAL( KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c , "Girls Tennis"), "GTEN", IF(ISPICKVAL( KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c , "Boys Golf"), "BGLF", IF(ISPICKVAL( KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c , "Girls Golf"), "GGLF", IF(ISPICKVAL( KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c , "Instrumental"), "INS", NULL)))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Sport Abbreviation
